word:
The work of God will elevate you if you will be elevated. Many think that they must live to please themselves else life is of no value. They indulge in this pleasure and that pleasure. It is their custom to live up to the last edge of means. God wants every man and woman to do his best."--Ms 13, 1893, pp. 2, 3. ("Diligence in Service," April 7, 1893.) 

Released May 16, 1968.
